description:
non-structured free text describing the object formulated in such a way by the manufacturer that its intended purpose, its intended functions and application  is unambiguously transmitted.
NOTE 1 - An object may be used in other aplication areas or for different purposes than intended by the manufacturer. This may influence product safety, private product liability and contractual liability.
NOTE 2 - The object is considered  being newly manufactured not containing reused parts, unless such information is provided by the manufacturer (see IEC 62309).
NOTE 3 - The object description is not to be mixed with a brand name or product name as given by the manufacturer for marketing purposes
NOTE 4 - For object descriptions there may be local or regional specifications by special product provisions.
